identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.core_philosophy: Precision, Density, Speed. No fluff. Every pixel has a job.
identity.visual_mood: Blueprint meets Modern SaaS. High contrast, structural, tool-like.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, KPI values

mono.usage: SKUs, Location Codes, Prices, Order IDs

primary.name: Industrial Blue
primary.usage: Primary Buttons, Active States, Header Backgrounds

secondary.name: Safety Orange
secondary.usage: Call to Actions (Pick, Print), Alerts, Focus Rings

buttons.primary: bg-[#002D62] hover:bg-[#001D40] text-white font-medium tracking-wide rounded-sm shadow-sm active:scale-95 transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-300 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-sm
buttons.action: bg-[#F97316] hover:bg-[#EA580C] text-white font-bold uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm shadow-md

inputs.style: h-12 text-lg border-slate-300 focus:border-[#F97316] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#F97316]/20 rounded-sm transition-all
inputs.label: text-sm font-semibold text-slate-600 uppercase tracking-wider mb-1

tables.header: text-xs text-slate-500 uppercase bg-slate-100 font-bold tracking-wider py-3 px-4

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on sidebar only
visual_enhancers.focus_states: CRITICAL: Visible 2px offset ring in Safety Orange (#F97316) for keyboard navigation

motion.interactions: Buttons scale down slightly on click. Rows highlight instantly on hover.

universal_guidelines.keyboard_nav: Every actionable element MUST be reachable via Tab. Add 'hotkey' hints (e.g., [Ctrl+K]) in UI labels.
universal_guidelines.density: Reduce default padding by 20% in the dashboard tables to fit more rows.
universal_guidelines.alignment: Numbers in tables must be Right Aligned. Status badges Center Aligned. Text Left Aligned.
universal_guidelines.feedback: Show a toast notification for EVERY successful action (Add to cart, Saved, Deleted).
universal_guidelines.empty_states: Never leave a table empty. Show a 'No items found' state with a clear CTA to add item.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup the Theme first. Update tailwind.config.js with the 'colors' object defined here.
3. Build the 'Public' pages using the 'Tetris Grid' layout.
4. Build the 'Dashboard' using the 'High Density' layout.
5. Ensure the 'Mark as Picked' workflow is ONE CLICK or ONE SCAN.
6. Use the provided Image URLs for the catalogue and hero sections.
7. CRITICAL: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
